name: PetPal
overview: Fun, premium dog accessories brand for devoted pet parents who treat their fur babies like family. We create stylish, durable products that make every walk an adventure and every moment with your pup Instagram-worthy.
targetAudience: Millennial dog owners aged 28-40 who consider their dogs family members. Active on social media, willing to spend on quality products, often refers to themselves as 'dog mom' or 'dog dad'.

voice.tone: Warm, playful, and enthusiastic. We speak dog-parent to dog-parent, with lots of love and a touch of humor.
examples: Ready for walkies? Our adventure harness keeps your good boy secure while you both explore the world together!
Spoil your fur baby (they deserve it, obviously) with our ultra-cozy beds designed for maximum snooze comfort.

doStatements: Always refer to pets with personality and emotion
Emphasize safety and durability in product descriptions
Include cute dog puns when appropriate
dontStatements: Don't refer to dogs as 'it' - use 'they' or he/she
Never suggest products are just for 'pets' - they're for family

metadata.name: Charlie
metadata.description: Happy golden retriever, the brand mascot
